data.event: This represents an increase of 5.0% from the 2000 census.

event.title: was created by the State of New York on April 10, 1818

data.event: The town of Amherst was created by the State of New York on April 10, 1818.

event.title: was elected the first supervisor of the town of Amherst in 1819

data.event: Timothy S. Hopkins was elected the first supervisor of the town of Amherst in 1819.
